transcript: I don't think I have a huge y I think I enjoy doing what I do every day I like business and so I spend all my time doing business what's the big why for a painter who paints he likes painting and so I think that at least for me that's been my secret sure there should be a mission in terms of what you're trying to accomplish in the business but like on a daily basis like the thing that gets me up is just the fact that I like it
